00009 #import "WIRemoting.h"
00010 
00011 @implementation RMSession
00012 
00013 @synthesize call, delegate, authenticated;
00014 
00015 #pragma mark session management
00016 
00017 - (id) initWithAuthenticator: (id<RMAuthenticator>) newAuthenticator
00018                         call:(RMCall*) newCall
00019                     delegate: (id<RMResultDelegate>) newDelegate
00020 {
00021   self = [super init];
00022   if (nil != self) {
00023     // grab instances
00024     authenticator = [newAuthenticator retain];
00025     call = [newCall retain];
00026     delegate = [newDelegate retain];
00027     
00028     // initialize variables
00029     authenticated = NO;
00030     
00031   }
00032   return self;
00033 }
00034 
00035 - (void) dealloc
00036 {
00037   [authenticator release];
00038   [call release];
00039   [delegate release];
00040   [super dealloc];
00041 }
00042 
00043 - (void) close {
00044 }
00045 
00046 #pragma mark authentication
00047 
00048 - (void) authenticate
00049 {
00050   [authenticator authenticateWithCall:self.call delegate:self];
00051 }
00052 
00053 - (void)finished:(RMResponse *)response
00054 {
00055   BOOL auth = NO;
00056   // check responseString
00057   if ([authenticator
00058        respondsToSelector:@selector(authenticateResponseString:)]) {
00059     if ([authenticator authenticateResponseString:[response responseString]]) {
00060       auth = YES;
00061     }
00062   }
00063   // check responseData
00064   if ([authenticator
00065        respondsToSelector:@selector(authenticateResponseData:)]) {
00066     if ([authenticator authenticateResponseData:[response responseData]]) {
00067       auth = YES;
00068     }
00069   }
00070   // if authenticated
00071   if (auth) {
00072     authenticated = YES;
00073     // call delegate
00074     [delegate finished:response];
00075   }
00076   else {
00077     authenticated = NO;
00078     // create a new NSError
00079     NSError *error =
00080         [NSError errorWithDomain:NSURLErrorDomain
00081                             code:EINVAL
00082                         userInfo:
00083           [NSDictionary
00084            dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:
00085            @"Authentication error.", NSLocalizedDescriptionKey,
00086            @"Unable to authenticate the session.", NSLocalizedFailureReasonErrorKey,
00087            nil]];
00088     [delegate failed:response error:error];
00089   }
00090 }
00091 
00092 - (void)failed:(RMResponse *)response error:(NSError *)error
00093 {
00094   [delegate failed:response error:error];
00095 }
00096 
00097 #pragma mark call
00098 
00099 - (BOOL)call:(NSString*) method
00100    arguments:(NSDictionary*) arguments
00101     delegate:(id<RMResultDelegate>) callDelegate
00102 {
00103   return [call call:method
00104           arguments:arguments
00105            delegate:callDelegate
00106            protocol:[authenticator callProtocol]];
00107 }
00108 
00109 @end
